sourcesContent:
import React from 'react';

import { Box, Text, Heading, Button, Anchor } from 'grommet';

const choiceView = ({ item, toggleUi }) => {
  return (
    <Box 
      background="accent-4" 
      align="center"
      height="100%" 
      width="100%" 
    >
      <Box 
        justify="around"
        align="center"
        height="85%"
        width="100%"
      >
        {/* TITLE TEXT */}
        <Box height="20%" justify="center">
          <Heading textAlign="center" size="small" level="3" color="dark-1">
            You ran out of options, you should try
          </Heading>
        </Box>
        {/* CHOICE INFORMATION */}
        <Box height="60%" width="100%" pad={{ left: "large", right: "large" }}>
          <Box height="50%" justify="end" align="center">
            <Heading 
              textAlign="center" 
              color="dark-1" 
              size="medium" 
              level="2"
            >
              {item.name}
            </Heading>
          </Box>
          <Box 
            justify="center" 
            direction="row" 
            align="start" 
            gap="xlarge"
            margin={{ bottom: "large" }}
          >
            <Text weight="bold" color="dark-1">{item.title}</Text>
            <Text weight="bold" color="dark-1">{item.distance}</Text>
          </Box>


          <Box 
            background={{ "color": "dark-1", "opacity": "weak"}}
            round="large" 
            width="66px" 
            pad="small"
            alignSelf="center"
            justify="center" 
          >
            <Anchor 
              alignSelf="center" 
              target="_blank"
              color="dark-1" 
              size="small" 
              label="Info" 
              primary 
            />
          </Box>


        </Box>
        {/* TEXTO ABAJo */}
        <Box height="20%" pad={{ left: "large", right: "large" }} justify="end">
          {/* <Text textAlign="center" size="small" weight="bold">
            You ran out of options, try again or tweak your custom search parameters
          </Text> */}
        </Box>
      </Box>
      <Box height="15%" justify="center">
        <Button 
          onClick={() => toggleUi('landing')} 
          label="Try again" 
          color="dark-1" 
          primary
        />
      </Box>
    </Box>
  )
}

export default choiceView;
